manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For over 60 years, Summit Brands has created highly effective, sustainable, and innovative household cleaning products with optimal results. Plink, Glisten, OUT, and Woolite doesn’t just help keep homes clean — they help keep our nation thriving by being produced in America. Summit Brands understands that when we place the “Made in the USA” icon on our product that we are representing a higher standard of quality, excellent craftsmanship, and a superior product. Plink Washer and Dishwasher Freshener and Cleaner Fresh Lemon Scent (4 Uses) Plink Washer and Dishwasher Freshener and Cleaner deodorizes washers and dishwasher, fizzes away foul odors and removes buildup and residue from hidden areas of your machine. New Lemon Scent Technology cleans your smelly washer and dishwasher, leaving your appliance with lasting freshness.

Features: No Extra Scrubbing The powerful formula removes buildups and washes away foul odor. Versatile Formula Used for all types of dishwashers and washing machines. Safe to Use Ideal for use since it does not contain harsh and abrasive chemicals.

Plink Garbage Disposal Freshener & Cleaner Plink Fizzy Drain Freshener & Cleaner Plink Washer & Dishwasher Freshener & Cleaner Plink Drinkware Plink Dishwasher Freshener & Rinse Aid How It Works Innovative & economical ball freshens and cleans garbage disposals, washing away foul odors and leaving a fresh scent throughout your whole kitchen Effervescing tablet prevents drain buildup and eliminates foul odors; leaves the sink and whole room smelling fresh Removes buildup and odor-causing residue from the hidden parts of the machine; innovative fragrance technology washes away foul odors, leaving your appliance and room with lasting freshness Drop Plink Drinkware tablet in warm water and watch the stains dissolve. Plink Drinkware removes stains, mineral buildup, and odors Clip Plink on the dishwasher rack or basket. Leave in dishwasher during and between wash cycle for a fresh smelling dishwasher and sparkling dishes Appliance Garbage Disposal Any Sink or Drain Washing Machine or Dishwasher Drinkware including Glasses, Water Bottles, Coffee Mugs, Keurig, Ninja, Carafes,and other Coffee Makers Dishwasher Usage 2x per week or as needed 2x per week or as needed 1x per week or as needed Every 3 months or as needed Last up to 60 cycles or as needed Scents Fresh Lemon, Citrus Orange, Simply Fresh, Assorted Fresh Lemon Lemon Scent None Fresh Lemon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are so easy to use and keeps your dishwasher smelling fresh. All you do is plop one into the dishwasher and run it, and everything smells quite clean afterward. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plink-9024 is perfect for my front load washer.
reviews.reviewText: Plink-9024 worked well to clean my front load washer. I just pop one into the washer drum and hit "Clean Washer" cycle. The lemon scent is very refreshing and not overly strong; it provides a fresh smell in the laundry room. There is no visual residue, however, because some reviewers mention having allergic reactions to washer cleaning products, I do run a full wash cycle after cleaning just to be certain that there isn't any residue on the drum. Plink does not remove any staining on the door seal and inner rubber ring. You will need to place a bleach soaked rag on the inner seal and leave overnight to remove most of the staining.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could smell better
reviews.reviewText: Only issue is I'd like a better smell. Works great though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stinky Washer cleanup
reviews.reviewText: These work great for washers! I use them all the time to keep my washer fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps dish washer smelling fresh.
reviews.reviewText: Just drop it onto the bottom of the washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Keep getting orders that appear to have mold
reviews.reviewText: I had this set up for subscribe and save to get every 3 months. However the last 5 or 6 orders I’ve gotten, when I open the package, the disc appears to have some specks of mold. I obviously don’t want to clean my dishwasher with a moldy product so I don’t use those. But I’ve gotten packages where 3/4 discs have mold specks. It sucks because I like this product and use it frequently but now it seems like a waste of money since I’m not using the entire thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely smelling washer
reviews.reviewText: Used for our front loader washer, gets the musty smell out completely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product smells great but crumbles way too easy as you removed from package.
reviews.reviewText: I do like this product overall and I may very very well purchase it again, however I must share that as you remove each tablet from the cardboard 1/4 of the tablet crumbles. I don't care how careful I have done it always crumbles and I'm not sure why this is occurring but I purchased several packs and I thought maybe I got a bad pack but it happens to every single tablet I removed from the cardboard. It would be nice, if the company would provide replacement tablets for the order I placed since I probably lose one tablet out of every packet to crumbling. The scent is nice, but I feel the cost is a little higher than what the product is worth. Yes, I would recommend it to a friend as long as they know that the product will crumble. And, as I previously said I may or may not purchase it again I am undecided at this time.
